dialog.c2s_replace_title.message: Replace subject with regular expression before search

dialog.searchmoreheaderstooltip.message: A list of headers, which can be searched for. Header information in the message DB is updated only for new emails or after repairing a mail folder.

option.act_as_normal_filter.message: Act as Normal Filter when no tokens found in search string

option.c2s_enableCtrlReplace.message: Use subject replace for Ctrl Combo

option.c2s_enableShiftReplace.message: Use subject replace for Shift Combo

option.c2s_removeDomainName.message: Remove Domain Name for all email addresses

option.enable_statusbar_info3.message: s later after search was done or lost focus

option.enable_verbose_info.message: Show verbose information in error console

option.load_virtual_folder_in_tab.message: Load Saved Search folder in a new Tab

option.results_label_size.message: size of 'search results' when not active:

option.results_label_size.auto.message: Minimize while in vertical layout and expression search in QuickSearchBar

option.reusefolder.message: Keep selected folders for saved search

option.search_timeout.message: Set expression search input timeout to

option.search_timeout.tooltip_1.message: Start to search after you stop typing in the search inputbox for this time

option.search_timeout.tooltip_2.message: Hit Enter will start the search immediately

option.search_timeout.tooltip_3.message: Set to 0 will make the timeout really loooong

option.select_on_enter.message: Select first message after hit enter

option.showbuttonlabel.auto.message: Default, show icons and show/hide labels automatically

option.when_press_ctrl_plus_enter.message: When press Ctrl+Enter, create/update virtual folder in:

info.after.message:
after:Mar 10, 2011
af:(2011/03/01 -2011/03/09)
after:Mon, 25 Dec 1995 13:30:00 GMT
af:(3:0 -4:0) will search for messages in current view that date between 3am to 4am EVERY day

info.all.message: search message within from, to, cc, or subject fields, and the body

info.blank.message: Please type keywords to search, click this line for help

info.bodyre.message:
bodyre:/hello.*world/i
Body match
Warning! May crash your Thunderbird

info.days.message:
age:3 or older_than:today or days:(3 -5)
today means -1, week means 7 and month means 30

info.disable.message: You can disable this tooltip in option dialog

info.filename.message:
filename:foo.doc or fi:image or fn:msword or file:html
searches for an attachment name or type

info.from.message:
from:(Alice or Bob)
Searches From field

info.fromre.message:
fromre:/^[a-d].*[m-z]$/i
Searches From field using regular expression

info.fromto.message:
fromto:(Alice)
From, To, CC or BCC field contains

info.helpLine1.message: You can disable this tooltip in option dialog

info.only.message:
only:tom
tom should be the only recipients in to field

info.regex.message:
regex:/^begin/i or re:end$ or r:/\d+\s*\d+/
Subject matches

info.simple.message:
simple:hello'
Subject field contains, support special characters

info.size.message:
size:10 or size:1.4M
Message Size big than

info.smaller.message:
smaller:1G or sm:1024
Message Size less than

info.status.message:
is:replied or i:UnRead or status:Forwarded or status:F
The status can be one of Replied, Read, Marked/Star, Forwarded, UnRead, New, ImapDeleted or Attachment.

info.subject.message:
subject:(Hello -World!)
Searches Subject to Contains Hello but not World!

info.tag.message:
tag:Important
Tag contains
tag:NA means no tag

info.tore.message:
tore:/^[a-d].*[m-z]$/i
Searches recipients(To/Cc/Bcc) field using regular expression
